description: This is a market on if Drake will release a new studio album before the end of 2020. A studio album in this case can be defined as a new project on his Spotify page in the Albums section, with 8 or more songs and a release date in 2020. This market begins in October 2020, thus Dark Lane Demo Tapes does not count. This market will resolve to “Yes” if a studio album is released and is available via Spotify for streaming prior to 11:59PM EST on Dec 31, 2020. If a studio album is not released on Spotify by the aforementioned date, this market will resolve “No.” In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

title: Will Drake release a new studio album before the end of 2020?
